description: This is the second year in a row vtubers have been nominated.

description: Is it really "mindblowing" that people are skeptical of software that consistently doesn't do the things we're told it can do?
title: Microsoft's head of AI doesn't understand why people don't like AI, and I don't understand why he doesn't understand because it's pretty obvious

description: Way better than combing through a bunch of PDFs.

description: The Minecraft-inspired RPG may finally release after all, and Hypixel founder Simon Collins-Laflamme isn't keen to muck it up.

description: PUBG: Black Budget was announced in 2023, and that was the last we heard of it until now.
